title: Homemade Granola with Yummi Nuts Mix of Seeds and Omega Mix
ingredients: 2 packages of Yummi Nuts Mix of Seeds
2 packages of Yummi Nuts Omega Mix
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400ยบ F.
Step 2: Mix all the ingredients and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Step 4: Let cool and store in an airtight container.
